mapper.select: select c.num, c.member_id,c.product_num,p.product_name,p.product_img,p.product_price,c.amount from cart c join product p on (c.product_num = p.num) where member_id=#{member_id} order by num
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where member_id=#{member_id} and product_num=#{product_num}
update cart set amount = amount+#{amount} where member_id=#{member_id} and product_num = #{product_num}
